Definition: The unique identifier issued to schools by an authority with Statewide scope. The identifier may have scope over just government schools, or Catholic schools in one or more dioceses, or it may have scope over all schools in the state. The authority issuing the identifiers may be either the state department of education, or the state curriculum and test authority.

SIF.Definition: The state-assigned identifier for this school.

OtherStandards.Definition: Human readable identifier for this org e.g. NCES ID.
OtherStandards.Commentary: IMS One Roster only allows one identifier for its schools, and that identifier will typically be the local or state identifier, given the use cases One Roster is intended for.

Collections.Name: Australian Charities and Not-For-Profits Commission Registration
Collections.Commentary: State-scoped identifiers include Organisation's Incorporated Association Number.
